mapper.select: INSERT INTO notification ( notiNo, custNo, gymNo, ticketNo, notiTitle, notiMessage, notiDate, notiType, notiCheck ) VALUES ( coupon_seq.NextVAL, #{custNo}, #{gymNo}, #{ticketNo}, #{notiTitle}, #{notiMessage}, SYSDATE, #{notiType}, '0' )

SELECT no.notiNo, no.custNo, no.gymNo, no.ticketNo, no.notiTitle, no.notiMessage, no.notiDate, no.notiType, no.notiCheck, gm.gymName, tk.ticketName, cl.className, cl.classStarttime, cl.classEndtime, cl.classDate, cl.classStarttime, cl.classEndtime FROM Notification no LEFT JOIN Gym gm ON no.gymNo = gm.gymNo LEFT JOIN Class cl ON no.classNo = cl.classNo WHERE no.custNo = #{custNo} AND no.notiType= #{notiType}

SELECT no.notiNo, no.custNo, no.gymNo, no.ticketNo, no.notiTitle, no.notiMessage, no.notiDate, no.notiType, no.notiCheck, gm.gymName, tk.ticketName, cl.className, cl.classStarttime, cl.classEndtime, cl.classDate, cl.classStarttime, cl.classEndtime FROM Notification no LEFT JOIN Class cl ON cl.gymNo = no.gymNo LEFT JOIN Gym gm ON gm.gymNo = no.gymNo LEFT JOIN Ticket tk ON no.ticketNo = tk.ticketNo WHERE no.custNo = #{custNo}
